description: Returns the tags assigned to the resource, such as a target recovery point, backup plan, or backup vault.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the type of resource. Valid targets for ListTags are recovery points, backup plans, and backup vaults.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned items. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of items, NextToken allows you to return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the next token.
